game.name: Massacre At The Mirage
game.shortDescription: For less than the price of a movie ticket, experience your very own horror-fueled slasher flick in Massacre at the Mirage. Step into The Mirage cinema and face a chilling nightmare, where staff and patrons must survive a masked killer's rampage.
game.shortDescriptionEn: For less than the price of a movie ticket, experience your very own horror-fueled slasher flick in Massacre at the Mirage. Step into The Mirage cinema and face a chilling nightmare, where staff and patrons must survive a masked killer's rampage.

reviewHighlights.text: I'll be updating this with my full thoughts later. There is heavy, undisclosed use of AI generated art in this game. It is boring, it is poorly made....
ChatGPT generate an 80s 3D horror game with a spooky clown antagonist. I couldn't wait for this one to end.
